ai-tika-vin07t49:1_0: gets rid of making (them) torments for gold.
ai-tika-vin07t49:2_1: Since you accuse a monk of Āḷavī in three ways, since he accuses him of an offense, saying,
ai-tika-vin07t49:3_0: He is suspected and has been suspected. He is not suspected and fellow without suspected.
ai-tika-vin07t49:3_1: Hence it is said: “He is applied thought.”
ai-tika-vin07t49:4_1: Pāṭaliputta, the observance-day procedure, the monks from Pāvā—we hear about the Teaching, the monks from the group of six, and I announce my purity by way of the observance-day procedure by requisites, and I announce my purity by way of the mind that is purified and pure, (thinking): “I resided in couple, I have no purity of mindfulness and pure,”
ai-tika-vin07t49:5_0: his invitation is purified: born in the invitation of those who see, and he has made this purification, is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin07t49:5_1: these two persons of materiality; these two persons in the world are seen.
ai-tika-vin07t49:6_0: The expression of the speech is finished.
